column4: Hey all, I'm having an issue getting sound to work in virtualbox XP guest and my gutsy host. Sounds works in both, just not at the same time. If I play a sound in the guest, it steals the sound and I'm unable to play sounds in the host. Any ideas how to configure this to work?
Oddly, this "just works" for me with ALSA and an ancient SBLive.
But with other sound cards - onboard mostly - I've had to go the pulseaudio route.
Yeah I have an onboard (laptop) OK thanks for the tips!!
